statements: UPDATE biometric_authentication_records SET fingerprint_data = 'new_fingerprint_data' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE biometric_authentication_records SET face_scan_data = 'new_face_scan_data', iris_scan_data = 'new_iris_scan_data' WHERE user_id = 456;

UPDATE biometric_authentication_records SET fingerprint_data = 'encoded_fingerprint_data', iris_scan_data = 'encoded_iris_scan_data', face_scan_data = 'encoded_face_scan_data', timestamp = '2022-12-31 23:59:59' WHERE user_id = 123;

UPDATE biometric_authentication_records SET iris_scan_data = 'new_iris_data', fingerprint_data = 'new_fingerprint_data', timestamp = '2022-12-01 10:30:00', face_scan_data = 'new_face_scan_data' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE BiometricRecords SET facial_data = 'new_facial_data' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE UserAccessLogs SET verification_method = 'fingerprint' WHERE log_id = 100;
UPDATE BiometricRecords SET fingerprint_data = 'new_data', timestamp = NOW() WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE UserAccessLogs SET verification_method = 'face scan', access_time = '2023-09-30 10:00:00' WHERE log_id = 456;
UPDATE user_biometrics SET fingerprint_data = 'new_fingerprint_data' WHERE user_id = 1;

UPDATE face_recognition_logs SET verification_result = FALSE, timestamp = '2022-01-01' WHERE user_id = 456;
UPDATE biometric_records SET fingerprint_data = 'new_fingerprint_data' WHERE user_id = 100

UPDATE biometric_users SET fingerprint_template = 'new_template' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE face_logs SET face_image = 'new_image' WHERE log_id = 3;
